placeholder.TMPCMD: sh -c 'echo WARNING was not supposed to run >> /TMPWORKDIR/TMPLOGSPATH/WARN.TMPJOB.log'

file_setup.TMPCMD: sh -c 'mkdir -m 777 -p /TMPWORKDIR/TMPLOGSPATH/; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then mkdir -m 777 -p /TMPSHAREDIR/; fi; { ls -l /TMPWORKDIR/TMPCODEPATH/*py && mkdir -m 777 -p /TMPWORKDIR/TMPDATAPATH/ && sleep 5; } >/TMPWORKDIR/TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; STAT=$?; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR/ && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi && (exit $STAT); '

checker.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ cd /TMPWORKDIR/TMPCODEPATH/ && python3 check_utilities.py TMPSRC TMPOPTS && if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR/ && rsync -aR TMPDATAPATH/TMPSRC/ /TMPSHAREDIR/; fi; } >/TMPWORKDIR/TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; STAT=$?; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR/ && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi && (exit $STAT); '

exporter.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ cd /TMPWORKDIR/TMPCODEPATH/ && python3 export_utilities.py -s TMPTAXON -e TMPETYPE -b KNsample TMPOPTS ; } >/TMPWORKDIR/TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; STAT=$?; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR/ && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi && (exit $STAT); '

fetcher.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ cd /TMPWORKDIR/TMPDATAPATH/TMPALIASPATH && ls -l file_metadata.json && python3 /TMPWORKDIR/TMPCODEPATH/fetch_utilities.py file_metadata.json TMPOPTS && if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR/ && rsync -aR TMPDATAPATH/TMPALIASPATH/ /TMPSHAREDIR/ && cd TMPDATAPATH/ && find TMPALIASPATH -maxdepth 1 -type f ! -name '*.json' -delete; fi; } >/TMPWORKDIR/TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; STAT=$?; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR/ && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi && (exit $STAT); '

tabler.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ cd /TMPWORKDIR/TMPDATAPATH/TMPALIASPATH && python3 /TMPWORKDIR/TMPCODEPATH/table_utilities.py TMPCHUNK file_metadata.json TMPOPTS && if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR && rsync -aR --exclude='*.raw_line.*' TMPDATAPATH/TMPALIASPATH/TMPFILES /TMPSHAREDIR/ && cd TMPDATAPATH/TMPALIASPATH && rm TMPCHUNK ; fi; } >/TMPWORKDIR/TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; STAT=$?; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR/ && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi && (exit $STAT); '

mapper.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ python3 /TMPWORKDIR/TMPCODEPATH/conv_utilities.py /TMPWORKDIR/TMPDATAPATH/TMPTABLEPATH TMPOPTS && if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR && rsync -aR TMPDATAPATH/TMPFILES /TMPSHAREDIR/ && cd TMPDATAPATH && rm TMPFILES ; fi; } >/TMPWORKDIR/TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; STAT=$?; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR/ && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi && (exit $STAT); '

importer.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ python3 /TMPWORKDIR/TMPCODEPATH/import_utilities.py TMPIMPORTPATH TMPOPTS && if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR && rsync -aR TMPDATAPATH/TMPFILES /TMPSHAREDIR/ && cd TMPDATAPATH && rm TMPFILES ; fi; } >/TMPWORKDIR/TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; STAT=$?; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR/ && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi && (exit $STAT); '

next_step_caller.TMPCMD: sh -c '{ python3 /TMPWORKDIR/TMPCODEPATH/workflow_utilities.py TMPNEXTSTEP TMPOPTS -p TMPSTART && sleep 3; } >/TMPWORKDIR/TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log 2>&1; STAT=$?; if TMPSHAREBOOL ; then cd /TMPWORKDIR/ && rsync -aR TMPLOGSPATH/TMPJOB.log /TMPSHAREDIR/ ; fi && (exit $STAT); '
